nature structural & molecular biology Volume 30 | February 2023 | 233 | 233
Hironori Takeda, Jon V. Busto, Caroline Lindau, Akihisa Tsutsumi, Kentaro Tomii , Kenichiro Imai, Yu Yamamori, Takatsugu Hirokawa, Chie Motono, Iniyan Ganesan , Lena-Sophie Wenz, Thomas Becker , Masahide Kikkawa , Nikolaus Pfanner , Nils Wiedemann & Toshiya Endo
In the version of this article initially published, the top-right yellow label in Fig. 6a, now reading “Sam35”, appeared as “Sam37” and has now been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.

Author Correction: Mechanism of NAIP—NLRC4 inflammasome activation revealed by cryo-EM structure of unliganded NAIP5
Bhaskar Paidimuddala , Jianhao Cao , Grady Nash, Qing Xie, Hao Wu & Liman Zhang
In the version of this article initially published, the values for “Favored (%)” and “Disallowed (%)” in the Ramachandran plot section of Table 1 were reversed (now reading “82.88” and “0.39” for Favored and Disallowed, respectively). The values have been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
© The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature America, Inc. 2023
Correction to: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology https://doi.org/10.1038/s41594-02200889-2. Published online 5 January 2023.

title: Author Correction: A multipoint guidance mechanism for β-barrel folding on the SAM complex
